Name: Scpqual
Title: pan-Canadian Provider Qualification Types
Descriptino: SCPQUAL is used to encode the degree or educational rank of a healthcare provider credential as defined by the various Royal Canadian Professional Medical Collages. It is also supports the encoding “Expertise type” in the pan-Canadian version 3 messages

Name: AddressType
Title: AddressType
Descriptino: The type of an address (physical / postal).

Name: AddressUse
Title: AddressUse
Descriptino: The use of an address.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: BundleType
Title: BundleType
Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: CareTeamStatus
Title: CareTeamStatus
Descriptino: Indicates the status of the care team.

Name: ContactPointSystem
Title: ContactPointSystem
Descriptino: Telecommunications form for contact point.

Name: ContactPointUse
Title: ContactPointUse
Descriptino: Use of contact point.

Name: DaysOfWeek
Title: DaysOfWeek
Descriptino: The days of the week.

Name: HTTPVerb
Title: HTTPVerb
Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: IssueSeverity
Title: IssueSeverity
Descriptino: How the issue affects the success of the action.

Name: IssueType
Title: IssueType
Descriptino: A code that describes the type of issue.

Name: LocationMode
Title: LocationMode
Descriptino: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

Name: LocationStatus

Descriptino: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: OrganizationAffiliationRole
Title: Organization Affiliation Role
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of one Organization in relation to another.

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: LOINC
Title: Logical Observation Identifiers
Descriptino: Names and Codes (LOINC)
Used: LOINC provides a set of universal names and ID codes for identifying laboratory and clinical test results.1,2 LOINC facilitates the exchange and pooling of results, such as blood hemoglobin, serum potassium, or vital signs, for clinical care, outcomes management, and research. LOINC's universal identifiers (names and codes) can be used in the context of order and observation exchanges between information systems that use syntax standards such as HL73, CEN TC251, ISO TC215, ASTM4, and DICOM. Specifically, the identifier can be used as the coded value for an observation in any other standard that uses the observation/observation value paradigm, whether messages, documents, application programming interface (API), etc. For example, LOINC codes are used widely in the OBX segment Observation Identifier field (OBX-3) of an ORU HL7 (HL7 version 2.x or ASTM 1238-9410) message that may be sent between a Clinical Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS) and Electronic Health Record Systems (EHR).5, 6 In this way, LOINC codes provide universal identifiers that allow the exchange of clinical data between heterogeneous computing environments.

Name: SNOMED_CT
Title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
Descriptino: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

Name: ContactEntityType
Title: Contact entity type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

Name: LocationType
Title: Location type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.  This includes several 'non physical' codes which are still considered a location.

Name: OperationOutcomeCodes
Title: Operation Outcome Codes
Descriptino: Operation Outcome codes used by FHIR test servers (see Implementation file translations.xml)

Name: Program
Title: Program
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes that could be can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

Name: ServiceCategory
Title: Service category
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

Name: ServiceProvisionConditions
Title: ServiceProvisionConditions
Descriptino: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

Name: ReferralMethod
Title: ReferralMethod
Descriptino: The methods of referral can be used when referring to a specific HealthCareService resource.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: BedStatus
Title: bedStatus
Descriptino: Code system of concepts which specify the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DLD and PV1 segments.

Name: IdentifierType
Title: identifierType
Descriptino: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying type of identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging data types CX, PLN, PPN, XCN and XON.

Name: Confidentiality
Title: Confidentiality
Descriptino: A set of codes specifying the security classification of acts and roles in accordance with the definition for concept domain "Confidentiality".

Name: RoleCode
Title: RoleCode
Descriptino: A set of codes further specifying the kind of Role; specific classification codes for further qualifying RoleClass codes.

Name: RoleStatus
Title: RoleStatus
Descriptino: Codes representing the defined possible states of an Role, as defined by the Role class state machine.

Name: Ietf3066
Title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
Descriptino: Older value from OID registry.  Superceded; see recommendations in BCP-47.
